verbs.description: [ARG0: italy] pm [V: welcomes] [ARG1: s&p move to maintain rating lower outlook] italy premier has welcomed standard poor decision to maintain italy rating while still lowering the financial outlook for the country to negative from stable premier giuseppe conte said saturday the decision by the ratings agency was correct in light of the economic solidity of the country citing the competitiveness of italian businesses and the high level of italian private savings italy escaped another downgrade in the standard poor decision but the rating agency noted that the populist government policies are weighing on the country economic growth prospects a critical driver of government debt - to - gdp trajectory prime minister giuseppe conte italy standard poor moscow prime minister vladimir putin
